# PED::SET_ENABLE_HANDCUFFS

## Summary
Set whether hands should be cuffed when ragdolling

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** enable

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
ped can not pull out a weapon when true
